treatment-md.title: Oreobates remotus Jr, Amaro, Recoder, Sena & Rodrigues, 2012, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: A relict new species of Oreobates (Anura, Strabomantidae) from the Seasonally Dry Tropical Forests of Minas Gerais, Brazil, and its implication to the biogeography of the genus and that of South American Dry Forests
